Creative Architecture 2020

14.02.20

Creative Exchange 2020 is well underway.

Creative Exchange 2020, the most insightful annual gathering around European architecture at which creatives from all parts of the world showcase ideas and trends for the future development of architecture and the profession, is well underway. Join us in MAO and experience this inspiring event! #CEx20 (Images by Iztok Dimc)

off_gallery graz
Griesgasse 31, 8020 Graz
